d1_text:
Npc0212:
[GOSUB L_C7DC7F]
[GOTO_IF_TRUE L_C8045B]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG STUBBY_LEGS L_C8037F]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG PAULA_AT_HER_ROOM L_C80027]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG PAULAS_PARENTS_KNOW_ABOUT_HH_RESCUE L_C803AC]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG PAULA_JOINS L_C803AC]
; $C80027
L_C80027:
ï¿½This is the cycle shop[PAUSE 5] ï¿½Punk-Sureï¿½![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Bicycles are so much fun and are so convenient...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It's a lot faster than walking.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You'll be really popular with the biking crowd.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Do you want a bicycle?[LINE_BREAK]
[LOAD_STRING "Yes"]
 [LOAD_STRING "No"]
[PRINT_STRINGS_HORZ 2]
[CREATE_MENU]
[CLEAR_LINE]
[MULTI_GOTO L_C800F5 L_C800C1]
; $C800C1
L_C800C1:
[CHECK_HAS_ITEM ANY BICYCLE][GOTO_IF_TRUE L_C802E6]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG HAS_BICYCLE L_C8034D]
ï¿½Oh... you don't know how to ride a bike.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Me neither.[HALT][END]
